secret.description: Name of the k8s secret to use for the license key

Name of the existing secret to use for MongoDB credentials

connectionString.description: Connection string for the AMQP queue (e.g., for Azure Service Bus)

secret.description: Name of the existing secret to use for RabbitMQ credentials

scheme.description: Redis connection scheme (redis or rediss for SSL)

secret.description: Name of the existing secret to use for Redis credentials
Name of the existing secret to use for the QDRANT Data-Sink

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the ingress

host.description: Hostname to use for the ingress

tlsSecretName.description: TLS secret name to use for the ingress

ingressClassName.description: Ingress class name to use for the ingress

logLevel.description: Log level for the application (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)

secret.description: Name of the existing secret to use for the OpenAI API key
Name of the existing secret to use for the Anthropic API key
Name of the existing secret to use for the Google Gemini API key
Name of the existing secret to use for the Azure OpenAI API key

sonnet3_5ModelVersionName.description: Sonnet 3.5 model version name example. Usually needs a 'us.', 'global.', or 'eu.' prefix.

sonnet3_7ModelVersionName.description: Sonnet 3.7 model version name example. Usually needs a 'us.', 'global.', or 'eu.' prefix.

secret.description: Name of the existing secret to use for the AWS Bedrock API key
Name of the existing secret to use for the Google Vertex AI API key

enabled.description: Enable Basic Auth for the backend

validEmailDomain.description: Valid email domain for the application

secret.description: Name of the existing secret to use for the JWT secret
Name of the existing secret to use for OIDC configuration

extraEnvVariables.description: Extra environment variables to add to the pods for storage buckets

securityContext.description: Security context for the S3Proxy container

resources.description: Set container requests and limits for different resources like CPU or memory

maxFileSizeUiMb.description: LlamaExtract max file size (MB) allowed for UI

maxJobsInExecutionPerJobType.description: Maximum number of jobs in execution per job type

maxIndexJobsInExecution.description: Maximum number of index jobs in execution

maxDocumentIngestionJobsInExecution.description: Maximum number of document ingestion jobs in execution

includeJobErrorDetails.description: Whether to always include job error details in API and the UI

defaultTransformDocumentTimeoutSeconds.description: Default timeout in seconds for document transformation jobs

transformEmbeddingCharLimit.description: Character limit for transform embedding operations

maxQueueConcurrency.description: Max number of jobs the worker can process at the same time

preferedPremiumModel.description: Prefered premium LLM model to use for the application

layoutModeBlockParseConcurrency.description: layout mode block parse concurrency setting

layoutModeReadingOrderDetectionConcurren.description: layout mode reading order detection concurrency setting

gpu.description: Enable GPU acceleration for OCR processing (if false, uses CPU backend)
Enable GPU acceleration for Layout processing (if false, uses CPU backend)

workerRegistryProfile.description: Temporal worker registry profile (default or consolidated)

attributes.description: Name of the first search attribute

name.description: Name of the second search attribute

type.description: Type of the second search attribute (Text, Keyword, Int, Double, Bool, Datetime, KeywordList)

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

imagePullSecrets.description: Image pull secrets to use for the images string list
